casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shakita Necole WALTON 311P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Walton, Shakita Necole. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for State. Heather Haney, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
